data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of South Kazakhstan prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in South Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 22,808 believers in South Kazakhstan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of South Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Karachai people might believe through him.
Spirit, train the church of South Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in South Kazakhstan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of South Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan has a population of 3,890,300.

We estimate South Kazakhstan has 22,808 people who might know Jesus, 508,540 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,358,952 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 170 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of South Kazakhstan to exponentially multiply disciples.
